>

</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [druid feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=6/feats).

<title level="2">Basic Wilding leads to...</title>
[Advanced Wilding](/Feats.aspx?ID=705)
